code: import React from'react';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);export default function BetterChart(_ref){let{data}=_ref;if(!data||!data.labels||data.labels.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'#888',padding:'20px'},children:"No chart data to display."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"better-chart-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:data,options:{responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{display:true,position:'top',labels:{font:{size:14,family:'Segoe UI, Arial'},color:'#3a7bd5'}},title:{display:true,text:'Error/Info Frequency',font:{size:20,family:'Segoe UI, Arial'},color:'#3a7bd5',padding:{top:10,bottom:20}},tooltip:{enabled:true,backgroundColor:'#3a7bd5',titleColor:'#fff',bodyColor:'#fff',borderColor:'#00d2ff',borderWidth:1,caretSize:8,padding:12}},scales:{x:{ticks:{color:'#3a7bd5',font:{size:13}},grid:{color:'#e0eafc'}},y:{beginAtZero:true,ticks:{color:'#3a7bd5',font:{size:13}},grid:{color:'#e0eafc'}}}},height:320})});}
